attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most people in Beverley want to hear the clock chiming through the night. The bells have been there for many years and any newcomers to Beverley (since at least 1900 when the present set of bells were installed) cannot complain as the bells were there first.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
